sources.title: Bad Hurt | FULL MOVIE | Dark Drama
sources.description:
One family wages a hopeful battle against the personal demons and destructive secrets that threaten to rip them apart. Starring Theo Rossi and Karen Allen.

#drama #dark #familydrama #secret #thriller #movie #freemoviesonline #fullmoviefree #karenallen #theorossi #mentalillness #mentalhealth

sources.title: Bad Hurt | FULL MOVIE | Veteran Returns Home, Inspiring | Theo Rossi, Karen Allen
sources.description:
A NYC family is overcome with chaos as a son returns from war and a handicapped daughter requires increasing care.  But through their struggles shines a strong family bond that shows how determination can overcome even the darkest times.

Directed by Mark Kemble
2015
Starring Theo Rossi, Karen Allen, Ashley Williams, Michael Harney, Johnny Whitworth, Dorothy Lyman

Winner Festival Prize, Sunscreen Film Festival West, best narrative feature.

Official Selection: 
Tribeca Film Festival
Montana Film Festival
Petaluma International Film Festival
Berkshire International Film Festival

#veterans #family
